definitions.body: net-ornament on pillars, 1Ki 7:17, 1Ki 7:17 (om. LXX Kit Benz), v:1Ki 7:18, v:1Ki 7:20 (crpt., cf. Kit Benz), v:1Ki 7:41, v:1Ki 7:42, v:1Ki 7:42, 2Ch 4:12, 2Ch 4:13, 2Ch 4:13, 2Ki 25:17, 2Ki 25:17 ‖ Je 52:22, Je 52:23.
network, toils, for catcing animals (fig.) Job 18:8 (+ [[רֶשֶׁת]], [[פַּךְ]], [[חַמִּים]]).
